name: Something is fleshy (Nylash, Papasucre)
description:
We are two friends making games and trying to open our own studio :
La Boulangerie. If you enjoy our game don't hesitate to let us a comment and even if you don't, every opinion is good to take.

Martin Chauveau : https://papasucre.itch.io/
Benjamin Peltier : https://nylash.itch.io/

Splash art by Meryem Erikci
Music by Stefan Kartenberg
